User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://www.handymangreeleyco.com/sitemap.xml

# Block access to admin areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /wp-admin/
Disallow: /wp-includes/
Disallow: /wp-content/plugins/
Disallow: /wp-content/themes/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /about
Allow: /services
Allow: /contact
Allow: /light-fixtures
